description:
Plaxen & Adler, P.A., is a Westminster personal injury firm founded by experienced attorney Bruce M. Plaxen in 1985. Mr. Plaxen established our law firm in order to provide a voice to victims of negligence in Maryland. Today, Mr. Plaxen, principal and partner Harry R. Adler, and associate attorney David A. Muncy continue to strive toward that same goal by assisting clients with cases stemming from the following:

  • Dog bites
  • Fungal meningitis stemming from contaminated injections
  • Medical malpractice, hospital negligence and birth injuries
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Product and premises liability
  • Social Security Disability
  • Workers’ compensation
  • Wrongful death

Our law firm's attorneys are completely dedicated to protecting the rights of victims. Founding attorney Bruce Plaxen demonstrated this dedication when he helped organize the largest pro bono project in history after the attacks on New York and Washington on 9/11. Through his work on the project, he was able to assist the families of victims from Maryland, New York and Virginia.

If you are a victim or if you have lost a family member because of another person's or entity's negligence, you could benefit from discussing your situation with the attorneys at the law firm of Plaxen & Adler, P.A. We offer free initial consultations, and will even meet with you on evenings or weekends. In addition, we are happy to meet with you at your home or in the hospital if you are unable to travel. Put our dedication and experience to work for you.
